As difficult as it is to become a good engineer, it is also difficult to become a good electrician as well

M.A.M. College of Engineering and Technology was established with the aim of providing quality education on par with international standards. It persistently seeks and adopts innovative methods to improve the quality of education on a consistent basis for the past 14 years.
To produce highly competent engineers and technocrats through continual improvement of the standard of teaching, training and research.
To impart to our youth sound technical knowledge, practical training with a real time exposure.To impart to our youth sound technical knowledge, practical training with a real time exposure
To imbibe in the minds of the young students the values of ethics and discipline.
MAMCET students are encouraged to grab the opportunities and make good use of the facilities available in the Campus for self development.
